creator: cederber@gmail.com
text:
It would be nice for the FTP Request Sampler to allow uploading of content from
an inline JLabeledTextArea, like the SOAP/XML-RPC Request Sampler does.  This
way variable substitution, etc. could be used with such requests.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44632 ***
creator: sebb@apache.org
